PROFILE_SETTINGS.TITLE: 个人资料设置
PROFILE_SETTINGS.AVATAR_DELETE_FAILED: 删除头像时出现错误，请重试
PROFILE_SETTINGS.UPDATE_SUCCESS: 您的个人资料已更新成功
PROFILE_SETTINGS.AFTER_EMAIL_CHANGED: 您的个人资料已成功更新，请在您的登录凭据更改后重新登录

PROFILE_SECTION.TITLE: 个人信息
PROFILE_SECTION.NOTE: 您的电子邮件地址是您的身份并用于登录。

SEND_MESSAGE.TITLE: 发送消息的快捷键
SEND_MESSAGE.NOTE: 您可以根据您的写入偏好选择一个快捷键 (输入或 Cmd/Ctrl+Enter)。
SEND_MESSAGE.UPDATE_SUCCESS: 您的设置已经更新成功

ENTER_KEY.HEADING: Enter (↵)
ENTER_KEY.CONTENT: 按 Enter 键发送消息，而不是单击发送按钮。

CMD_ENTER_KEY.HEADING: Cmd/Ctrl + Enter (⌘ + ↵)
CMD_ENTER_KEY.CONTENT: 按下 Cmd/Ctrl + Enter 发送消息，而不是点击发送按钮。

INTERFACE_SECTION.TITLE: 界面
INTERFACE_SECTION.NOTE: 自定义您的 Chatwoot 仪表板的外观和感觉。

FONT_SIZE.TITLE: 字体大小
FONT_SIZE.NOTE: 根据您的偏好调整仪表板中的文本大小。
FONT_SIZE.UPDATE_SUCCESS: 您的字体设置已成功更新
FONT_SIZE.UPDATE_ERROR: 更新字体设置时出错，请重试

LANGUAGE.TITLE: 首选语言
LANGUAGE.NOTE: 选择您想要使用的语言。
LANGUAGE.UPDATE_SUCCESS: 您的语言设置已成功更新
LANGUAGE.UPDATE_ERROR: 更新语言设置时出错，请重试

MESSAGE_SIGNATURE_SECTION.TITLE: 个人消息签名
MESSAGE_SIGNATURE_SECTION.NOTE: 创建一个唯一的消息签名来显示在您从任何收件箱发送的消息的末尾。 您也可以包含一个内联图片，它支持在直播聊天、电子邮件和API收件箱中。
MESSAGE_SIGNATURE_SECTION.IMAGE_UPLOAD_ERROR: 无法上传图片！请再试一次
MESSAGE_SIGNATURE_SECTION.IMAGE_UPLOAD_SUCCESS: 图片添加成功。请点击保存签名。

MESSAGE_SIGNATURE.LABEL: 消息签名
MESSAGE_SIGNATURE.PLACEHOLDER: 在此插入您的个人消息签名。

PASSWORD_SECTION.TITLE: 密码
PASSWORD_SECTION.NOTE: 更新您的密码会在多个设备中重置您的登录信息。

SECURITY_SECTION.TITLE: 安全
SECURITY_SECTION.NOTE: Manage additional security features for your account.

ACCESS_TOKEN.TITLE: 访问令牌
ACCESS_TOKEN.NOTE: 如果您正在构建基于 API 的集成，这个令牌可以被使用
ACCESS_TOKEN.RESET_SUCCESS: 成功重新生成访问令牌
ACCESS_TOKEN.RESET_ERROR: 无法重新生成访问令牌。请重试

AUDIO_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.TITLE: 音频提醒
AUDIO_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.NOTE: 在仪表板中为新消息和会话启用音频提醒。

ALERT_TYPES.NOTME: 分配给其他人的开放会话

ALERT_COMBINATIONS.NONE: 您尚未选择任何选项，您不会收到任何音频提醒。
ALERT_COMBINATIONS.ASSIGNED: 您将收到分配给您的会话的提醒。
ALERT_COMBINATIONS.UNASSIGNED: 您将收到任何未分配会话的提醒。
ALERT_COMBINATIONS.NOTME: 您将收到分配给其他人的会话的提醒。
ALERT_COMBINATIONS.ASSIGNED+UNASSIGNED: 您将收到分配给您的会话和任何未处理会话的提醒。
ALERT_COMBINATIONS.ASSIGNED+NOTME: 您将收到分配给您的会话和分配给其他人的会话的提醒，但不会收到未分配会话的提醒。
ALERT_COMBINATIONS.NOTME+UNASSIGNED: 您将收到未处理会话和分配给其他人的会话的提醒。
ALERT_COMBINATIONS.ASSIGNED+NOTME+UNASSIGNED: 您将收到所有会话的提醒。

CONDITIONS.TITLE: 提醒条件：
CONDITIONS.CONDITION_ONE: 仅在浏览器窗口未激活时发送音频提醒
CONDITIONS.CONDITION_TWO: 每30秒发送一次提醒，直到所有分配的会话被阅读

AUDIO_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.SOUND_PERMISSION_ERROR: 您的浏览器中禁用了自动播放。要自动听到提醒，请在浏览器设置中启用声音权限或与页面进行交互。

EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.TITLE: 电子邮件通知
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.NOTE: 在此更新您的电子邮件通知设置
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_ASSIGNMENT: 当对话分配给我时发送电子邮件通知
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_CREATION: 当对话分配给我时发送电子邮件通知
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_MENTION: 当您在会话中被提及时发送电子邮件通知
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.ASSIGNED_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: 在已分配的会话中创建新消息时发送电子邮件通知
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.PARTICIPATING_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: 当参与会话中创建新消息时发送电子邮件通知
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.SLA_MISSED_FIRST_RESPONSE: 当会话错过首次响应 SLA 时发送电子邮件通知
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.SLA_MISSED_NEXT_RESPONSE: 当会话错过下次响应 SLA 时发送电子邮件通知
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.SLA_MISSED_RESOLUTION: 当会话错过解决 SLA 时发送电子邮件通知

NOTIFICATIONS.TITLE: 通知偏好

TYPES.ASSIGNED_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: 在分配的会话中创建了新消息
TYPES.PARTICIPATING_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: 在参与的会话中创建了新消息
TYPES.SLA_MISSED_FIRST_RESPONSE: 会话错过了首次响应 SLA
TYPES.SLA_MISSED_NEXT_RESPONSE: 会话错过了下次响应 SLA

NOTIFICATIONS.BROWSER_PERMISSION: 为您的浏览器启用推送通知，以便您能够接收它们

API.UPDATE_SUCCESS: 您的通知设置已成功更新
API.UPDATE_ERROR: 更新配置时出错，请再试一次

PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.TITLE: 推送通知
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.NOTE: 在此更新您的推送通知设置
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_ASSIGNMENT: 当对话被分配给我时发送推送通知
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_CREATION: 创建新对话时发送推送通知
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_MENTION: 当您在会话中被提及时发送推送通知
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.ASSIGNED_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: 在已分配的会话中创建新消息时发送推送通知
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.PARTICIPATING_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: 当参与会话中创建新消息时发送推送通知
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.HAS_ENABLED_PUSH: 您已启用此浏览器的推送。
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.SLA_MISSED_FIRST_RESPONSE: 当会话错过首次响应 SLA 时发送推送通知
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.SLA_MISSED_NEXT_RESPONSE: 当会话错过下次响应 SLA 时发送推送通知
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.SLA_MISSED_RESOLUTION: 当会话错过解决 SLA 时发送推送通知

NAME.LABEL: 您的全名
NAME.ERROR: 请输入一个有效的全名

DISPLAY_NAME.LABEL: 展示名
DISPLAY_NAME.ERROR: 请输入一个有效的全名
DISPLAY_NAME.PLACEHOLDER: 请输入显示名称，将会在对话中显示

AVAILABILITY.LABEL: 有效的
AVAILABILITY.SET_AVAILABILITY_ERROR: 无法设置可用性，请重试
AVAILABILITY.IMPERSONATING_ERROR: 当您处于模拟用户状态时，无法更改其在线状态

EMAIL.LABEL: 您的电子邮件地址
EMAIL.ERROR: 请输入一个有效的电子邮件
EMAIL.PLACEHOLDER: 请输入您的名字，这将会在对话中显示

PASSWORD.LABEL: 新密码
PASSWORD.ERROR: 请输入长度6或更长的密码

PASSWORD_CONFIRMATION.LABEL: 重新输入一次密码
PASSWORD_CONFIRMATION.PLACEHOLDER: 请重新输入您的新密码

SIDEBAR_ITEMS.SELECTOR_SUBTITLE: 从以下列表中选择一个账户

APP_GLOBAL.EMAIL_VERIFICATION_PENDING: 您似乎尚未验证您的电子邮件地址。请检查您的收件箱以获取验证邮件。
APP_GLOBAL.EMAIL_VERIFICATION_SENT: 验证邮件已发送。请检查您的收件箱。

ACCOUNT_SUSPENDED.TITLE: 账户已暂停
ACCOUNT_SUSPENDED.MESSAGE: 您的账户已被暂停。请联系支持团队以获取更多信息。

SIDEBAR.REAUTHORIZE: 您的收件箱连接已过期，请重新连接以继续接收和发送消息

SET_AUTO_OFFLINE.INFO_TEXT: 当您不使用应用程序或仪表板时，让系统自动标记您离线。
SET_AUTO_OFFLINE.INFO_SHORT: 当您不使用应用程序时自动标记离线。

BILLING_SETTINGS.TITLE: 计费方式
BILLING_SETTINGS.DESCRIPTION: 在此管理您的订阅，升级您的计划并为您的团队获取更多功能。

CURRENT_PLAN.TITLE: 当前计划
CURRENT_PLAN.PLAN_NOTE: 您当前订阅的是 **{plan}** 计划，拥有 **{quantity}** 个许可证

MANAGE_SUBSCRIPTION.TITLE: 管理您的订阅
MANAGE_SUBSCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION: 查看您之前的发票，编辑您的账单详细信息或取消您的订阅。

CAPTAIN.TITLE: Captain
CAPTAIN.DESCRIPTION: 管理 Captain AI 的使用和积分。
CAPTAIN.UPGRADE: Captain 在免费计划中不可用，立即升级以获取助手、副驾驶等更多功能。

CHAT_WITH_US.TITLE: 需要帮助吗？
CHAT_WITH_US.DESCRIPTION: 您在计费方面遇到任何问题吗？我们在此为您提供帮助。

BILLING_SETTINGS.NO_BILLING_USER: 您的计费账户正在配置中。请刷新页面并重试。

SECURITY_SETTINGS.TITLE: 安全
SECURITY_SETTINGS.DESCRIPTION: 管理您的账户安全设置。
SECURITY_SETTINGS.LINK_TEXT: 了解更多关于 SAML SSO 的信息

SAML.TITLE: SAML SSO
SAML.NOTE: Configure SAML single sign-on for your account. Users will authenticate through your identity provider instead of using email/password.

ACS_URL.LABEL: ACS URL
ACS_URL.TOOLTIP: Assertion Consumer Service URL - Configure this URL in your IdP as the destination for SAML responses

SSO_URL.LABEL: SSO URL
SSO_URL.HELP: The URL where SAML authentication requests will be sent

CERTIFICATE.LABEL: Signing certificate in PEM format
CERTIFICATE.HELP: The public certificate from your identity provider used to verify SAML responses

FINGERPRINT.LABEL: Fingerprint
FINGERPRINT.TOOLTIP: SHA-1 fingerprint of the certificate - Use this to verify the certificate in your IdP configuration

SP_ENTITY_ID.LABEL: SP Entity ID
SP_ENTITY_ID.HELP: Unique identifier for this application as a service provider (auto-generated).
SP_ENTITY_ID.TOOLTIP: Unique identifier for Chatwoot as the Service Provider - Configure this in your IdP settings

IDP_ENTITY_ID.LABEL: Identity Provider Entity ID
IDP_ENTITY_ID.HELP: Unique identifier for your identity provider (usually found in IdP configuration)

VALIDATION.REQUIRED_FIELDS: SSO URL, Identity Provider Entity ID, and Certificate are required fields
VALIDATION.SSO_URL_ERROR: Please enter a valid SSO URL
VALIDATION.IDP_ENTITY_ID_ERROR: Identity Provider Entity ID is required

ENTERPRISE_PAYWALL.AVAILABLE_ON: The SAML SSO feature is only available in the Enterprise plans.
ENTERPRISE_PAYWALL.UPGRADE_PROMPT: Upgrade to an Enterprise plan to access SAML single sign-on and other advanced security features.
ENTERPRISE_PAYWALL.ASK_ADMIN: 请联系您的管理员进行升级。

PAYWALL.TITLE: Upgrade to enable SAML SSO
PAYWALL.AVAILABLE_ON: The SAML SSO feature is only available in the Enterprise plans.
PAYWALL.UPGRADE_PROMPT: Upgrade your plan to get access to SAML single sign-on and other advanced features.
PAYWALL.CANCEL_ANYTIME: 您可以随时更改或取消您的计划

ATTRIBUTE_MAPPING.TITLE: SAML Attribute Setup
ATTRIBUTE_MAPPING.DESCRIPTION: The following attribute mappings must be configured in your identity provider

INFO_SECTION.TITLE: Service Provider Information
INFO_SECTION.TOOLTIP: Copy these values and configure them in your Identity Provider to establish the SAML connection

CREATE_ACCOUNT.NO_ACCOUNT_WARNING: 哦，糟糕！我们找不到任何 Chatwoot 账户。请创建一个新账户以继续。

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: 无法连接服务器，请稍后再试

TITLE.MOVE_TO_NEXT_TAB: 移动到对话列表中的下一个标签

HEADER.TITLE: Agent assignment
HEADER.DESCRIPTION: Define policies to effectively manage workload and route conversations based on the needs of inboxes and agents. Learn more here

ASSIGNMENT_POLICY.TITLE: Assignment policy
ASSIGNMENT_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Manage how conversations get assigned in inboxes.
FEATURES: Assign by conversations evenly or by available capacity
Add fair distribution rules to avoid overloading any agent
Add inboxes to a policy - one policy per inbox

AGENT_CAPACITY_POLICY.TITLE: Agent capacity policy
FEATURES: Create exceptions based on labels and time
Add agents to a policy - one policy per agent

CONFIRM_ADD_INBOX_DIALOG.TITLE: Add inbox
CONFIRM_ADD_INBOX_DIALOG.DESCRIPTION: {inboxName} inbox is already linked to another policy. Are you sure you want to link it to this policy? It will be unlinked from the other policy.

ADD.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to add inbox to policy

REMOVE.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to remove inbox from policy

BALANCED.LABEL: Balanced
BALANCED.DESCRIPTION: Assign conversations based on available capacity.

EARLIEST_CREATED.LABEL: Earliest created
EARLIEST_CREATED.DESCRIPTION: The conversation that was created first gets assigned first.

LONGEST_WAITING.LABEL: Longest waiting
LONGEST_WAITING.DESCRIPTION: The conversation waiting the longest gets assigned first.

FAIR_DISTRIBUTION.LABEL: Fair distribution policy
FAIR_DISTRIBUTION.DESCRIPTION: Set the maximum number of conversations that can be assigned per agent within a time window to avoid overloading any one agent. This required field defaults to 100 conversations per hour.

INBOXES.LABEL: Added inboxes
INBOXES.DESCRIPTION: Add inboxes for which this policy will be applicable.

DROPDOWN.SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Search and select inboxes to add

INBOXES.EMPTY_STATE: No inboxes added to this policy, add an inbox to get started

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to add inbox to policy
Failed to create agent capacity policy

CONFIRM_ADD_AGENT_DIALOG.TITLE: Add agent
CONFIRM_ADD_AGENT_DIALOG.DESCRIPTION: {agentName} is already linked to another policy. Are you sure you want to link it to this policy? It will be unlinked from the other policy.

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to update agent capacity policy

ADD.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to add agent to policy

REMOVE.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to remove agent from policy

EXCLUSION_RULES.LABEL: Exclusion rules
EXCLUSION_RULES.DESCRIPTION: Conversations that satisfy the following conditions would not count towards agent capacity

TAGS.LABEL: Exclude conversations tagged with specific labels

DROPDOWN.SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Search and select tags to add

TAGS.EMPTY_STATE: No tags added to this policy.

DURATION.LABEL: Exclude conversations older than a specified duration

USERS.LABEL: Assigned agents
USERS.DESCRIPTION: Add agents for which this policy will be applicable.

DROPDOWN.SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Search and select agents to add

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to add agent to policy

DELETE_POLICY.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to delete agent capacity policy

DELETE_POLICY.TITLE: Delete policy
DELETE_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to delete this policy? This action cannot be undone.
